casebody.data:
Menachem Binyamin ZIVOTOFSKY, By His Parents and Guardians, Ari Z. and Naomi Siegam ZIVOTOFSKY, petitioner,
v.
John KERRY, Secretary of State. No. 13-628. Supreme Court of the United States April 21, 2014.

Petition for writ of certiorari to the United States Court of Appeals for the District of Columbia Circuit granted.
